data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What skill do you have that you could teach to others? Who would you teach this skill to and why? How do you think knowing this skill would improve their lives?
data.answer: Being proficient in English is a skill that I have and could teach to others. It is something a lot of people my age don't have. From a young age, I watched numerous English movies and listened to English songs, which gave me a firm grasp on the language. This also laid a concrete foundation for my English study. At the age of 16, I went abroad alone to Australia where I completed secondary and tertiary education. I would teach English to anyone who wants to study English as a second language for academic, business or other general reasons. I suppose they can use it either to further their study abroad, facilitate their work, or make their life easier in overseas countries. (122字)
